theorem norm_cderiv_sub_lt (hr : 0 < r) (hfg : ∀ w ∈ sphere z r, «expr‖ ‖» (f w - g w) < M)
    (hf : ContinuousOn f (sphere z r)) (hg : ContinuousOn g (sphere z r)) :
    «expr‖ ‖» (cderiv r f z - cderiv r g z) < M / r :=
  cderiv_sub hr hf hg ▸ norm_cderiv_lt hr hfg (hf.sub hg)

theorem norm_cderiv_lt (hr : 0 < r) (hfM : ∀ w ∈ sphere z r, «expr‖ ‖» (f w) < M) (hf : ContinuousOn f (sphere z r)) :
    «expr‖ ‖» (cderiv r f z) < M / r :=

    by

    obtain ⟨x, hx, hx'⟩ := (isCompact_sphere z r).exists_forall_ge e1 e2
    exact ⟨«expr‖ ‖» (f x), hfM x hx, hx'⟩

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∑' , » -/
/-- If the terms in the sum `∑' (i : ι), F i` are uniformly bounded on `U` by a
summable function, then the sum of `deriv F i` at a point in `U` is the derivative of the
sum. -/
theorem has_sum_deriv_of_summable_norm {u : ι → exprℝ} (hu : Summable u)
    (hf : ∀ i : ι, differentiable_on (exprℂ) (F i) U) (hU : IsOpen U)
    (hF_le : ∀ (i : ι) (w : exprℂ), w ∈ U → «expr‖ ‖» (F i w) ≤ u i) (hz : z ∈ U) :
    HasSum (fun i : ι => deriv (F i) z)
      (deriv
        (fun w : exprℂ =>
          «expr∑' , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∑' , »" (F i w))
        z) :=
  by
  rw [HasSum]
  have hc := (tendsto_uniformly_on_tsum hu hF_le).tendsto_locally_uniformly_on
  convert(hc.deriv (eventually_of_forall fun s => differentiable_on.sum fun i hi => hf i) hU).tendsto_at hz using 1
  ext1 s
  exact (deriv_sum fun i hi => (hf i).differentiable_at (hU.mem_nhds hz)).symm
#align has_sum_deriv_of_summable_norm has_sum_deriv_of_summable_norm

/-- If the terms in the sum `∑' (i : ι), F i` are uniformly bounded on `U` by a

    (hf : ∀ i : ι, differentiable_on (exprℂ) (F i) U) (hU : IsOpen U)

      U :=

/-- A locally uniform limit of holomorphic functions on an open domain of the complex plane is
holomorphic (the derivatives converge locally uniformly to that of the limit, which is proved
as `tendsto_locally_uniformly_on.deriv`). -/
theorem _root_.tendsto_locally_uniformly_on.differentiable_on [φ.ne_bot] (hf : TendstoLocallyUniformlyOn F f φ U)
    (hF :
      «expr∀ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , »" φ

  obtain ⟨K, ⟨hKx, hK⟩, hKU⟩ := (compact_basis_nhds x).mem_iff.mp (hU.mem_nhds hx)
  obtain ⟨δ, hδ, -, h1⟩ := exists_cthickening_tendsto_uniformly_on hf hF hK hU hKU
  have h2 : interior K ⊆ U := interior_subset.trans hKU
  have h3 :
    «expr∀ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , »" φ
      (differentiable_on (exprℂ) (F n) (interior K))

  have h4 : TendstoLocallyUniformlyOn F f φ (interior K) := hf.mono h2

    h1.tendsto_locally_uniformly_on.mono interior_subset
  have h6 : ∀ x ∈ interior K, has_deriv_at f (cderiv δ f x) x := fun x h =>
    has_deriv_at_of_tendsto_locally_uniformly_on' isOpen_interior h5 h3 (fun _ => h4.tendsto_at) h
  have h7 : differentiable_on (exprℂ) f (interior K) := fun x hx => (h6 x hx).differentiable_at.differentiable_within_at
  exact (h7.differentiable_at (interior_mem_nhds.mpr hKx)).differentiable_within_at
#align tendsto_locally_uniformly_on.differentiable_on tendsto_locally_uniformly_on.differentiable_on

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
theorem _root_.tendsto_locally_uniformly_on.deriv (hf : TendstoLocallyUniformlyOn F f φ U)
    (hF :
      «expr∀ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , »" φ
        (differentiable_on (exprℂ) (F n) U))

  rw [tendstoLocallyUniformlyOn_iff_forall_isCompact hU]
  by_cases φ = «expr⊥»
  · simp only [h, TendstoUniformlyOn, eventually_bot, imp_true_iff]
  haveI : φ.ne_bot := ne_bot_iff.2 h
  rintro K hKU hK
  obtain ⟨δ, hδ, hK4, h⟩ := exists_cthickening_tendsto_uniformly_on hf hF hK hU hKU

cderiv_sub:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
theorem cderiv_sub (hr : 0 < r) (hf : ContinuousOn f (sphere z r)) (hg : ContinuousOn g (sphere z r)) :
    cderiv r (f - g) z = cderiv r f z - cderiv r g z :=
  by
  have h1 : ContinuousOn (fun w : exprℂ => ((w - z) ^ 2)⁻¹) (sphere z r) :=
    by
    refine' ((continuous_id'.sub continuous_const).pow 2).continuous_on.inv₀ fun w hw h => hr.ne _
    rwa [mem_sphere_iff_norm, sq_eq_zero_iff.mp h, norm_zero] at hw
  simp_rw [cderiv, ← smul_sub]
  congr 1
  simpa only [Pi.sub_apply, smul_sub] using
    circle_integral.integral_sub ((h1.smul hf).circle_integrable hr.le) ((h1.smul hg).circle_integrable hr.le)
#align cderiv_sub cderiv_sub
cderiv_eq_deriv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/

theorem cderiv_eq_deriv (hU : IsOpen U) (hf : differentiable_on (exprℂ) f U) (hr : 0 < r) (hzr : closedBall z r ⊆ U) :
    cderiv r f z = deriv f z :=
  two_pi_I_inv_smul_circle_integral_sub_sq_inv_smul_of_differentiable hU hzr hf (mem_ball_self hr)
#align cderiv_eq_deriv cderiv_eq_deriv
cderiv:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , » -/
theorem tendsto_uniformly_on.cderiv (hF : TendstoUniformlyOn F f φ (cthickening δ K)) (hδ : 0 < δ)
    (hFn :
      «expr∀ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , »" φ
        (ContinuousOn (F n) (cthickening δ K))) :
    TendstoUniformlyOn (cderiv δ ∘ F) (cderiv δ f) φ K :=
  by
  by_cases φ = «expr⊥»
  · simp only [h, TendstoUniformlyOn, eventually_bot, imp_true_iff]
  haveI : φ.ne_bot := ne_bot_iff.2 h
  have e1 : ContinuousOn f (cthickening δ K) := TendstoUniformlyOn.continuousOn hF hFn
  rw [tendsto_uniformly_on_iff] at hF⊢
  rintro ε hε
  filter_upwards [hF (ε * δ) (mul_pos hε hδ), hFn]with n h h' z hz
  simp_rw [dist_eq_norm] at h⊢
  have e2 : ∀ w ∈ sphere z δ, «expr‖ ‖» (f w - F n w) < ε * δ := fun w hw1 =>
    h w (closed_ball_subset_cthickening hz δ (sphere_subset_closed_ball hw1))
  have e3 := sphere_subset_closed_ball.trans (closed_ball_subset_cthickening hz δ)
  have hf : ContinuousOn f (sphere z δ) :=
    e1.mono (sphere_subset_closed_ball.trans (closed_ball_subset_cthickening hz δ))
  simpa only [mul_div_cancel _ hδ.ne.symm] using norm_cderiv_sub_lt hδ e2 hf (h'.mono e3)
#align tendsto_uniformly_on.cderiv tendsto_uniformly_on.cderiv
